Review: Been playing for a while and I truly enjoy it. Needs more players This game could be SO AMAZING if the public version consisted of more than 3 players! Guessers really need more than just 2 clues to have a reasonable chance to guess correctly when the possibilities are endless for what the secret word might be. Somewhat similar to my favorite-of-all-time game "word riot" that was like "password" TV game, but in teams.
